brochure.coverDescription: GroeimetAI is your strategic partner in navigating the AI revolution. We help executive teams understand, plan, and implement AI solutions that drive measurable business value.
brochure.aboutDescription: GroeimetAI specializes in strategic AI consultancy, guiding organizations through their digital transformation journey. We don't build AI models - we help you understand how to leverage AI effectively for process optimization, cost reduction, and sustainable growth.
brochure.whyPoint1: Strategic focus on business outcomes, not technical implementation

enterpriseLLM.title: Enterprise LLM Implementation for 50,000 Employees
enterpriseLLM.challenge: Outdated trigger-based chatbot without NLU for internal support of 50,000 employees. Poor user experience and low resolution rate.
enterpriseLLM.solution: Agentic AI framework with Azure OpenAI integration. Agent autonomously decides: live agent transfer, catalog items, knowledge base, direct answers or legacy topics. GPT-4o-mini with intelligent conversation history (last 10 messages).
enterpriseLLM.details: Through implementing an intelligent LLM solution, the bank saves €2.8M annually on support costs. With 50,000 employees submitting an average of 2 tickets per month, saving €2.33 per ticket through automated handling.
enterpriseLLM.overview: Transformed an outdated trigger-based chatbot into an intelligent AI assistant serving 50,000 employees, achieving 85% faster response times and €2.8M annual savings.
challengePoints: Legacy chatbot with no Natural Language Understanding (NLU)
Poor user experience leading to low adoption rates
High volume of unresolved tickets requiring manual intervention
Inefficient trigger-based system causing user frustration
solutionPoints: Implemented Azure OpenAI with GPT-4o-mini for intelligent responses
Built an agentic framework for autonomous decision-making
Integrated with ServiceNow for seamless ticket management
Designed smart conversation history (last 10 messages) for context

ticketRouting.title: Intelligent Ticket Routing with Vector Database
ticketRouting.challenge: Thousands of Business Service Templates (BSTs) made it impossible for users to find the right template for their issue.
ticketRouting.solution: LLM-powered widget with vector database for semantic search. User describes problem, AI generates follow-up questions, creates perfect ticket and routes to correct team.
ticketRouting.details: Vector database implementation enabling semantic search across thousands of service templates, with intelligent follow-up questions for perfect ticket creation.
ticketRouting.overview: Revolutionized ticket routing by implementing a vector database solution that reduced thousands of templates to an intelligent system with 94% routing accuracy.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By accessing and using the services provided by GroeimetAI ("GroeimetAI", "we", "us", or "our"), you ("Client", "you", or "your") agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our services.

These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and GroeimetAI, registered in the Netherlands under Chamber of Commerce number 90102304, with its registered office in Apeldoorn.

By using our services, you represent that you have the legal capacity to enter into this agreement and that you are at least 18 years of age or have obtained parental consent.

services.title: Description of Services
services.content:
GroeimetAI provides professional AI consultancy services including but not limited to:

    • AI Strategy Development and Implementation
    • Generative AI (GenAI) Solutions and Integration
    • Large Language Model (LLM) Implementation and Fine-tuning
    • Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) Architecture Design
    • Multi-Agent AI Systems and Orchestration
    • ServiceNow AI Integration and Automation
    • Custom AI Solution Development
    • AI Training and Workshops
    • AI Governance and Ethics Consulting
    • Proof of Concept (PoC) Development

All services are provided on a professional consultancy basis and may be subject to separate service agreements, statements of work, or project specifications.

aiContent.title: AI-Generated Content and Model Usage
aiContent.content:
AI Output and Accuracy:
    • We utilize various AI models and technologies in our services. While we strive for accuracy, AI-generated content may contain errors, biases, or inaccuracies.
    • You acknowledge that AI outputs should be reviewed and validated before use in critical applications.
    • GroeimetAI is not liable for decisions made solely based on AI-generated recommendations without human oversight.

Model Training and Data Usage:
    • Unless otherwise agreed, your data will not be used to train or improve general AI models.
    • Any model fine-tuning or training using your data will be done exclusively for your benefit and with your explicit consent.
    • We maintain strict data isolation between clients to prevent cross-contamination of AI models.

Intellectual Property of AI Outputs:
    • AI-generated content created specifically for you during our engagement belongs to you, subject to payment of all fees.
    • Generic AI models, methodologies, and frameworks developed by GroeimetAI remain our intellectual property.
    • You grant us a license to use anonymized insights from our engagement to improve our services, unless otherwise agreed.

accounts.title: User Accounts and Responsibilities
accounts.content:
Account Creation and Management:
    • You may need to create an account to access certain services or platforms we provide.
    • You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
    • You must provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration.
    • You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.

Client Responsibilities:
    • Provide timely access to necessary systems, data, and personnel for service delivery.
    • Ensure all provided data complies with applicable laws and regulations.
    • Obtain necessary consents for data processing and AI application deployment.
    • Maintain appropriate backups of your data and systems.
    • Comply with any specific requirements outlined in service agreements.

Prohibited Uses:
    • Using our services for illegal, harmful, or unethical purposes.
    • Attempting to reverse engineer, decompile, or extract source code from our proprietary systems.
    • Using our services to develop competing AI consultancy services.
    • Sharing access credentials or allowing unauthorized access to our platforms.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content:
GroeimetAI Property:
    • All proprietary methodologies, frameworks, tools, and pre-existing intellectual property remain the exclusive property of GroeimetAI.
    • This includes but is not limited to our AI orchestration frameworks, assessment tools, and implementation methodologies.
    • We grant you a limited, non-exclusive license to use our deliverables for your internal business purposes.

Client Property:
    • You retain all rights to your pre-existing data, content, and intellectual property.
    • Any custom developments created specifically for you become your property upon full payment.
    • You grant us a limited license to use your data and content solely for providing our services.

Third-Party Components:
    • Our services may incorporate third-party AI models, libraries, or tools.
    • Such components are subject to their respective licenses and terms.
    • We will inform you of any significant third-party dependencies and their licensing requirements.

payment.title: Payment Terms and Refunds
payment.content:
Fees and Payment:
    • Service fees are specified in separate service agreements or quotations.
    • All fees are exclusive of VAT and other applicable taxes unless stated otherwise.
    • Payment terms are NET 30 days from invoice date unless otherwise agreed.
    • Late payments incur interest at the statutory commercial rate applicable in the Netherlands.

Billing Models:
    • Fixed Price: For defined scope projects with clear deliverables.
    • Time & Materials: Billed based on actual hours worked at agreed hourly rates.
    • Retainer: Monthly fee for ongoing support and consultation.
    • Success-Based: Fees tied to achieving specific, measurable outcomes (where applicable).

Refunds and Cancellations:
    • Due to the consultancy nature of our services, refunds are generally not provided for completed work.
    • Cancellation terms are specified in individual service agreements.
    • For subscription services, cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period.
    • Disputes regarding fees must be raised within 30 days of invoice date.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
Limitation of Liability:
    • To the maximum extent permitted by law, GroeimetAI's total liability for any claims arising from these Terms or our services shall not exceed the fees paid by you in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.
    • We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including lost profits, data loss, or business interruption.

Exclusions:
    • Liability arising from your misuse of AI technologies or failure to implement recommended safeguards.
    • Damages resulting from third-party AI models or services beyond our control.
    • Loss or damage caused by circumstances beyond our reasonable control (force majeure).
    • Consequences of decisions made based on AI outputs without appropriate human oversight.

Indemnification:
    • You agree to indemnify and hold GroeimetAI harmless from any claims arising from:
      - Your use of our services in violation of these Terms
      - Your violation of any laws or third-party rights
      - Content or data you provide to us
      - Your deployment or use of AI solutions we help develop

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.content:
Confidential Information:
    • Both parties acknowledge that they may have access to confidential information during the engagement.
    • "Confidential Information" includes any non-public information marked as confidential or that would reasonably be considered confidential.
    • This includes business strategies, technical data, AI models, algorithms, customer data, and pricing information.

Obligations:
    • Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of all Confidential Information.
    • Confidential Information will only be used for purposes related to the services.
    • Disclosure is limited to employees and contractors who need to know and are bound by confidentiality obligations.

Exceptions:
    • Information that becomes publicly available through no breach of these Terms.
    • Information independently developed without use of Confidential Information.
    • Information required to be disclosed by law or court order (with prompt notice to the other party).

Duration:
    • Confidentiality obligations survive termination of these Terms for a period of five (5) years.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content:
Data Processing:
    • We process personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Dutch data protection laws.
    • Our detailed privacy practices are outlined in our Privacy Policy, which forms part of these Terms.
    • We act as a data processor for personal data you provide for AI processing purposes.

Security Measures:
    • We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect data.
    • This includes encryption, access controls, and regular security assessments.
    • We maintain ISO 27001 compliant information security practices.

Data Processing Agreement:
    • For services involving personal data processing, we will enter into a separate Data Processing Agreement (DPA).
    • You warrant that you have all necessary consents and legal bases for data processing.
    • We will assist you in meeting your GDPR obligations related to our services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content:
Termination Rights:
    • Either party may terminate these Terms by providing 30 days written notice.
    • Either party may terminate immediately for material breach that remains uncured after 14 days notice.
    • We may suspend services immediately if you breach payment terms or engage in prohibited uses.

Effects of Termination:
    • Upon termination, all licenses granted under these Terms cease immediately.
    • You must pay all outstanding fees for services provided up to the termination date.
    • We will return or delete your Confidential Information upon written request.
    • Provisions that by their nature should survive termination will remain in effect.

Transition Assistance:
    • Upon request and for additional fees, we provide transition assistance for up to 90 days post-termination.
    • This includes knowledge transfer, documentation, and technical handover support.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Disputes
governingLaw.content:
Applicable Law:
    • These Terms are governed by the laws of the Netherlands.
    • The United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods does not apply.

Dispute Resolution:
    • Any disputes arising from these Terms shall first be addressed through good faith negotiations.
    • If negotiations fail, disputes shall be submitted to mediation under the rules of the Netherlands Mediation Institute.
    • If mediation fails, disputes shall be resolved by the competent courts of Apeldoorn, the Netherlands.

Language:
    • These Terms are drafted in English. In case of translation, the English version prevails.
    • All communication regarding these Terms shall be in English or Dutch, as mutually agreed.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content:
We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Material changes will be notified via:

• Email notification to your registered email address
• Prominent notice on our website
• In-platform notifications for active clients

Continued use of our services after notification constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

severability.title: Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, that provision shall be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that these Terms shall otherwise remain in full force and effect and enforceable.

entireAgreement.title: Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.content: These Terms, together with any applicable service agreements, statements of work, and our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and GroeimetAI regarding the use of our services. These Terms supersede any prior agreements or understandings, whether written or oral.

assignment.title: Assignment
assignment.content: You may not assign or transfer these Terms or any rights granted hereunder without our prior written consent. We may assign our rights and obligations under these Terms without restriction. Any attempted assignment in violation of this provision is void.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For questions about these Terms of Service or our services, please contact us:

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.content: By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you are entering into these Terms on behalf of a company or other legal entity, you represent that you have the authority to bind such entity to these Terms.

privacy.heroSubtitle: Your privacy is our priority - Fully GDPR compliant

intro.title: 1. Introduction and Identity of Controller
intro.content:
GroeimetAI ("we", "us", "our" or "GroeimetAI") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy informs you about how we handle your personal data when you visit our website, use our AI services, and tells you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

This privacy policy applies to all personal data we process from our customers, suppliers, partners, website visitors and other data subjects. We process personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable laws and regulations.

**Identity and contact details:**
GroeimetAI
Chamber of Commerce number: 90102304
Registered office: Apeldoorn, Netherlands
Phone: +31 (6)81 739 018
Email: privacy@groeimetai.io
Website: https://groeimetai.io

dpo.title: 2. Data Protection Officer (DPO)
dpo.content:
We have appointed a Data Protection Officer who oversees compliance with privacy legislation within our organization.

**DPO contact details:**
Name: [DPO Name]
Email: dpo@groeimetai.io
Phone: +31 (0)20 123 4568

You can contact our DPO for all questions regarding the processing of your personal data and the exercise of your rights under the GDPR.

dataCollection.title: 3. Categories of Personal Data We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect and process various categories of personal data, depending on your interaction with our services:

**3.1 Data you provide directly to us:**
• **Identity data:** First and last name, date of birth, gender
• **Contact data:** Email address, phone number, postal address, company name
• **Account data:** Username, password (encrypted), account preferences
• **Financial data:** Billing information, payment information (processed via secure payment processors)
• **Communication data:** Content of emails, chat messages, support tickets
• **Professional data:** Job title, work experience, skills (for business customers)

**3.2 Data collected automatically:**
• **Technical data:** IP address, browser type and version, time zone setting, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform
• **Usage data:** Information about your visit to our website, including full URL clickstream, page views, page response times, download errors, duration of visits
• **Location data:** Estimated location based on IP address (country/region level)
• **Cookie data:** See our [Cookie Policy](/cookies) for detailed information

**3.3 AI interaction data:**
• **Prompts and queries:** Questions and commands you provide to our AI systems
• **AI-generated content:** Responses and content generated by our AI
• **Feedback and corrections:** Your feedback on AI output to improve our services
• **Usage patterns:** How you use our AI tools, frequency, preferences

**3.4 Data from third parties:**
• **Social media data:** If you sign up via social media accounts
• **Partner data:** Information from our business partners for joint projects
• **Public sources:** Publicly available business information for B2B services

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Bases for Processing (GDPR Article 6)
legalBasis.content:
We only process your personal data when we have a valid legal basis under Article 6 of the GDPR:

**4.1 Performance of a contract (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR):**
• Delivery of our AI services and products
• Creating and managing accounts
• Providing customer service and support
• Billing and payment processing

**4.2 Legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR):**
• Improving our AI models and services
• Security and fraud prevention
• Internal administration and business analysis
• Direct marketing to existing customers (with opt-out option)

When processing based on legitimate interest, we always conduct a balancing test to ensure our interests do not outweigh your interests or fundamental rights and freedoms.

**4.3 Consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR):**
• Marketing communications to prospects
• Placing non-essential cookies
• Participation in research or beta tests
• Use of AI training data beyond contractual necessity

You can withdraw your consent at any time via privacy@groeimetai.io.

**4.4 Legal obligation (Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR):**
• Tax administration and fiscal obligations
• Compliance with court orders
• Anti-money laundering checks (where applicable)

**4.5 Vital interest (Art. 6(1)(d) GDPR):**
• In emergency situations where protection of life or health is necessary

dataUse.title: 5. Purposes of Data Processing
dataUse.content:
We use your personal data for the following specific purposes:

**5.1 Service delivery:**
• Executing AI consulting and implementation projects
• Delivering SaaS AI solutions
• Personalizing AI output based on your preferences
• Technical support and troubleshooting

**5.2 AI and Machine Learning:**
• Training and improving our AI models (only with explicit consent or anonymized)
• Quality control of AI-generated content
• Research into new AI applications
• A/B testing and performance optimization

**5.3 Communication:**
• Answering questions and requests
• Sending service-related notifications
• Newsletters and product announcements (with consent)
• Important updates about privacy or terms

**5.4 Business operations:**
• Billing and financial administration
• Risk management and compliance
• Internal audits and quality control
• Statistical analysis and reporting

**5.5 Marketing and sales:**
• Personalized offers (with consent)
• Market research and customer satisfaction
• Lead generation and conversion optimization
• Retargeting (only with cookie consent)

**5.6 Security:**
• Detection and prevention of fraud
• Monitoring system security
• Incident response and forensic investigation
• Access control and authentication

aiSpecific.title: 6. AI-Specific Privacy Considerations
aiSpecific.content:
As an AI service provider, we have specific responsibilities regarding your privacy:

**6.1 AI Training and Model Development:**
• We do NOT use your personal data for training our general AI models without explicit consent
• Where possible, we use synthetic data or fully anonymized datasets
• Strict data governance protocols are applied for customer-specific models
• You have the right to request that your data not be used for training

**6.2 AI Output and Intellectual Property:**
• AI-generated content based on your input remains your property
• We claim no rights to content generated for your specific use case
• Metadata about AI interactions is stored anonymized for performance improvement

**6.3 Bias and Fairness:**
• We actively monitor for bias in our AI systems
• Regular audits are conducted to prevent discrimination
• Transparency about AI decision-making where possible and relevant

**6.4 Explainable AI:**
• You have the right to explanation about significant AI decisions
• We document the logic behind our AI systems
• Human review is available for critical decisions

**6.5 Data Minimization in AI:**
• We only collect data necessary for AI functionality
• Automatic data expiration for non-essential AI training data
• Opt-in for extended data collection for improved personalization

dataSharing.title: 7. Sharing Data with Third Parties
dataSharing.content:
We only share your personal data under strict conditions and safeguards:

**7.1 Categories of recipients:**

**Service providers (processors):**
• Cloud hosting providers (Google Cloud Platform, with adequacy decision)
• Payment processors (Stripe, Mollie - PCI-DSS compliant)
• Email service providers (SendGrid - with processor agreement)
• Analytics services (Google Analytics with IP anonymization)
• Customer support tools (Intercom - Privacy Shield certified)

**Professional advisors:**
• Accountants (only for financial audits)
• Legal advisors (under confidentiality obligation)
• Compliance consultants (for privacy audits)

**Government authorities:**
• Tax authorities (legal obligation)
• Supervisory authorities (Dutch Data Protection Authority)
• Law enforcement (only with court order)

**7.2 Safeguards when sharing:**
• Processor agreements in accordance with Art. 28 GDPR
• Confidentiality agreements where applicable
• Data minimization - only necessary data
• Regular audits of third parties

**7.3 International transfers:**
See section 8 for details on international data transfers.

**7.4 We NEVER sell your data:**
GroeimetAI does not sell, rent or lease your personal data to third parties for marketing or other commercial purposes.

internationalTransfers.title: 8. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content:
Some of our service providers are located outside the European Economic Area (EEA). We ensure appropriate safeguards:

**8.1 Transfer mechanisms:**
• **Adequacy decisions:** Where possible, we work with countries with an adequacy decision (e.g., UK, Switzerland, Japan)
• **Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs):** For transfers to countries without adequacy decision, we use EU-approved model contracts
• **Additional measures:** Encryption, pseudonymization, access controls

**8.2 Specific transfers:**

**Google Cloud Platform (US):**
• Basis: Standard Contractual Clauses + additional technical measures
• Data location: Primarily EU data centers (Frankfurt, Belgium)
• Encryption: At-rest and in-transit encryption

**Firebase/Google Services:**
• Basis: Google's EU Data Protection Terms
• Compliance: ISO 27001, SOC 2/3 certifications
• Data residency options where available

**8.3 Your rights regarding international transfers:**
• You can request a copy of the safeguards used
• You have the right to object to specific transfers
• We will inform you of significant new international transfers

dataSecurity.title: 9. Technical and Organizational Security Measures
dataSecurity.content:
We implement state-of-the-art security to protect your data:

**9.1 Technical measures:**
• **Encryption:** AES-256 for data at-rest, TLS 1.3 for data in-transit
• **Access controls:** Multi-factor authentication, role-based access control (RBAC)
• **Network security:** Firewalls, intrusion detection systems, DDoS protection
• **Application security:** OWASP Top 10 compliance, regular penetration tests
• **Backup and recovery:** Daily encrypted backups, disaster recovery plan

**9.2 Organizational measures:**
• **Personnel:** Background checks, confidentiality agreements, privacy training
• **Policies:** Information Security Management System (ISMS)
• **Incident response:** 24/7 security monitoring, incident response team
• **Vendor management:** Security assessments of all suppliers
• **Physical security:** Access control to offices and server rooms

**9.3 AI-specific security:**
• **Model security:** Protection against adversarial attacks
• **Prompt injection prevention:** Input validation and sanitization
• **Output filtering:** Prevention of sensitive data leakage
• **Audit trails:** Logging of all AI interactions

**9.4 Compliance certifications:**
• ISO 27001 (planned for Q3 2024)
• SOC 2 Type II (in progress)
• NEN 7510 for healthcare customers

dataBreach.title: 10. Data Breach Procedures
dataBreach.content:
We take data breaches very seriously and have comprehensive procedures:

**10.1 Detection and response:**
• 24/7 monitoring of security incidents
• Automatic alerts for suspicious activities
• Incident response team with clear escalation procedures

**10.2 Notification obligation (Art. 33-34 GDPR):**
• **Notification to DPA:** Within 72 hours of discovery (unless no risk)
• **Notification to data subjects:** Without undue delay for high risk
• **Notification content:** Nature of breach, categories of data subjects/data, consequences, measures taken

**10.3 Documentation:**
• All incidents are documented in our data breach register
• Root cause analysis and lessons learned for each significant incident
• Annual review of security incidents

**10.4 Mitigation measures:**
• Immediate isolation of affected systems
• Password resets where necessary
• Enhanced monitoring of affected accounts
• Free credit monitoring for significant breaches (where applicable)

**10.5 Communication:**
• Dedicated page on website for incident updates
• Direct contact via email/phone for high-risk data subjects
• Transparent communication about steps taken

retention.title: 11. Retention Periods
retention.content:
We do not retain your data longer than necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:

**11.1 General retention periods:**

**Customer data:**
• Active customers: For the duration of the agreement
• After termination: 7 years (tax retention obligation)
• Exception: Basic contact details for legitimate interests

**AI interaction data:**
• Prompts and outputs: 90 days (unless otherwise agreed)
• Anonymized training data: Unlimited
• Performance metrics: 2 years

**Marketing data:**
• Newsletter subscribers: Until unsubscribe + 1 year
• Website analytics: 26 months
• Marketing automation: Until withdrawal of consent

**Application data:**
• Rejected candidates: 4 weeks after completion of procedure
• With consent: 1 year for future vacancies

**Support and communication:**
• Support tickets: 2 years after closure
• Email correspondence: 2 years
• Chat logs: 90 days

**11.2 Exceptions:**
• Longer retention for legal obligations
• Ongoing legal proceedings
• Vital interest of data subject

**11.3 Data deletion:**
• Secure deletion via crypto-shredding
• Cascade delete in all backup systems
• Verification of complete deletion

yourRights.title: 12. Your Rights under the GDPR
yourRights.content:
As a data subject, you have extensive rights under the GDPR which we fully respect:

**12.1 Right of access (Art. 15 GDPR):**
• Confirmation whether we process your data
• Copy of your personal data
• Information about processing purposes, categories, recipients
• **Exercise:** Via privacy@groeimetai.io with copy of ID

**12.2 Right to rectification (Art. 16 GDPR):**
• Correction of inaccurate data
• Completion of incomplete data
• **Directly possible:** Via your account dashboard or support

**12.3 Right to erasure/"right to be forgotten" (Art. 17 GDPR):**
• Deletion when data is no longer necessary
• Upon withdrawal of consent (and no other legal basis)
• For unlawful processing
• **Note:** Not possible with legal retention obligations

**12.4 Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR):**
• Temporary stop on processing for:
  - Contested accuracy of data
  - Unlawful processing
  - Pending objection procedure

**12.5 Right to data portability (Art. 20 GDPR):**
• Receive your data in structured, commonly used format
• Direct transfer to another controller where possible
• **Available for:** Data provided based on consent/contract

**12.6 Right to object (Art. 21 GDPR):**
• Object to processing based on legitimate interest
• Object to direct marketing (always honored)
• **Result:** We stop unless compelling legitimate grounds

**12.7 Rights regarding automated decision-making (Art. 22 GDPR):**
• Right not to be subject to fully automated decisions
• Right to human intervention
• **At GroeimetAI:** Human review always possible for AI decisions

**12.8 Withdrawal of consent:**
• You can always withdraw consent
• No consequences for lawfulness of earlier processing
• **How:** Via account settings or privacy@groeimetai.io

**12.9 Right to lodge a complaint:**
• With Dutch Data Protection Authority: www.autoriteitpersoonsgegevens.nl
• With your local supervisory authority (EU-wide)
• We prefer to resolve your complaint ourselves first

**12.10 Response time:**
• We respond within 1 month to your request
• Extension of 2 months possible for complex requests
• Free of charge, unless requests are manifestly unfounded/excessive

children.title: 13. Children's Privacy
children.content:
We take the protection of children very seriously:

**13.1 Age limit:**
• Our services are not directed at persons under 16 years of age
• We do not knowingly collect data from children under 16
• For B2B educational AI tools: only via schools/institutions

**13.2 Parental consent:**
• For users aged 13-16, parental consent is required
• Verification via email to parent/guardian
• Parents have full control over child data

**13.3 If we accidentally collect child data:**
• Immediate deletion upon becoming aware
• Notification to parents if known
• Review of our age-gating mechanisms

**13.4 Educational AI use:**
• Only through agreements with educational institutions
• Strict data minimization
• No marketing to children
• Additional security measures

**13.5 Reporting child data:**
If you suspect we have inadvertently collected data from a child, please contact us immediately at privacy@groeimetai.io

cookies.title: 14. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
We use cookies and similar technologies for various purposes:

**14.1 Types of cookies:**

**Essential cookies:**
• Session management
• Security tokens
• Load balancing
• **Legal basis:** Necessary for service provision

**Functional cookies:**
• Language preferences
• UI personalization
• Login remember me
• **Legal basis:** Legitimate interest

**Analytical cookies:**
• Google Analytics (anonymized)
• Hotjar (session recordings with consent)
• Custom analytics
• **Legal basis:** Consent

**Marketing cookies:**
• Google Ads remarketing
• LinkedIn Insight Tag
• Facebook Pixel
• **Legal basis:** Consent

**14.2 Cookie management:**
• Cookie banner on first visit
• Granular cookie preferences
• Withdraw consent anytime
• Cookie-free version of website available

**14.3 Alternative tracking:**
• Server-side analytics where possible
• Privacy-friendly alternatives (Plausible)
• No fingerprinting techniques

**For complete cookie overview, see our [Cookie Policy](/cookies)**

thirdParty.title: 15. Third Party Integrations
thirdParty.content:
Transparency about our key technology partners:

**15.1 Infrastructure providers:**

**Google Cloud Platform:**
• Services: Compute, Storage, AI/ML APIs
• Data location: EU (primary), global failover
• Compliance: GDPR processor terms, ISO 27001
• DPA: cloud.google.com/terms/data-processing-addendum

**Firebase (Google):**
• Services: Authentication, Realtime Database, Hosting
• Privacy: Covered under Google Cloud DPA
• Data residency: EU region configured

**15.2 AI/ML Services:**

**OpenAI API:**
• Services: GPT model access
• Data retention: 30 days, no training on customer data
• Compliance: SOC 2, business associate agreement available
• API data processing addendum present

**Anthropic Claude API:**
• Services: Claude model access
• Zero data retention option available
• Enterprise privacy controls

**15.3 Business tools:**

**Stripe:**
• Services: Payment processing
• PCI-DSS Level 1 compliant
• No credit card data storage at GroeimetAI
• EU data processing

**SendGrid:**
• Services: Transactional email
• Data location: EU servers
• GDPR compliant with DPA

**15.4 Due diligence:**
• Annual privacy review of all vendors
• Data Processing Agreements with all processors
• Exit strategies for vendor lock-in
• Incident notification procedures

changes.title: 16. Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.content:
We may update this privacy policy periodically:

**16.1 Types of changes:**

**Minor changes:**
• Clarifications or typos
• Contact information updates
• New examples or explanations
• **Notification:** Update date on page

**Material changes:**
• New processing purposes
• Changes in data retention
• New third party recipients
• Changes in your rights
• **Notification:** Email + website banner + 30 days notice

**16.2 Version control:**
• All versions archived and available
• Changelog with key changes
• GitHub repository for transparency

**16.3 Your options with changes:**
• Review period of 30 days
• Opportunity to object/ask questions
• Opt-out for specific new processing
• Account termination without penalty

**16.4 Communication:**
• Email to all active users
• In-app notifications
• Blog post for significant updates
• Social media announcements

cookies.heroSubtitle: Transparency about how we use cookies

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content:
Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the owners of the website.

Cookies enable a website to remember your actions or preferences over time. They can contain information about your language preference, font size and other preferences, so you don't have to re-enter them every time you visit the website or navigate from one page to another.

howWeUse.title: How we use cookies
howWeUse.content:
GroeimetAI uses cookies to:

    • Improve the performance of our website
    • Remember your preferences and settings
    • Sign you in and keep your session secure
    • Analyze and understand the use of our website
    • Personalize our services
    • Measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns
    • Prevent fraud and improve security

We respect your privacy and will only use cookies as described in this policy and in accordance with the GDPR and Dutch Telecommunications Act.

typesOfCookies.title: Types of cookies we use
typesOfCookies.content: We use the following categories of cookies on our website:

thirdParty.title: Third-party cookies
thirdParty.content:
Some of our pages may contain third-party cookies. These are placed by external service providers that help us analyze, secure or provide functionality to our website.

Important third parties whose cookies we use:

    • Google Analytics - For website analysis
    • Google reCAPTCHA - For security against spam
    • Stripe - For secure payment processing
    • Intercom - For customer service chat

These third parties have their own privacy and cookie policies. We have no control over these cookies and refer you to their respective policies for more information.

whyServiceNow.title: Why ServiceNow?
whyServiceNow.description: ServiceNow itself is very active with AI - NowAssist, AI Search, Process Optimization. Fortune 500 companies invest millions in AI within ServiceNow.
whyServiceNow.problem: But even these AI-forward companies had no idea how to give agents access.
whyServiceNow.solution: That's why we took it upon ourselves: ServiceNow as the IDEAL example case. If Fortune 500 companies with incredible AI expertise don't know - then nobody understands it.
whyServiceNow.conclusion: That's what we're here for. We make it simple.

problemSolution.problemDescription: Despite all AI investments: the ticket system was completely closed to external agents. No agent could create tickets, trigger workflows, or retrieve data.
problemSolution.solutionDescription: We implemented MCP servers that convert ServiceNow APIs into agent-accessible interfaces. Now agents can integrate seamlessly.
